p: The global fight against coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) requires concerted efforts of all specialists with advanced knowledge and skills in public health, epidemiology, virology and immunology. The improved understanding of the virus structure and its destructive actions with hyperinflammation and dreadful systemic manifestations points to the necessity of a multidisciplinary approach. Such an approach is required for timely diagnosis and treatment of COVID-19 and preventing further spread of the virus in the community.
